segments.text: Hi there . Do you need any help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been told about something called Southern Fund . How can I buy it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First of all , you should open a Fund Account with us , just fill in this form . We'll need to see some ID and your Cash Card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds simple enough . Do you charge any admin fees for that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll have to pay 20 RIB , and then you will have your Southern Fund Management company card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you need any other documentation from me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we'll need to fill in this form , for fund trading and this one , for subscribing for and / or applying for purchasing fund units . The minimum is 500 RIB .
segments.speaker: S1
